channel.title: UNIPBAN 667/711! REP++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
channel.description: How do you unipban someone? My admin went rogue and ip banned me and a few others and client wont even load i tried ::unipban on my friend computer on teamviewer and delete the whole ipban file and we cant connect... it wont even load...

item.title: UNIPBAN 667/711! REP++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. Your topic title is annoying.
  2. In the future, be more strict about who you give power to in your server.
  3. I’m assuming that your server is running on a sort of dedicated machine. In that case, connect to it, remove any sort of trace for your ban, and ban the admin.

Read full topic
